name: Photon Storm
description:
This game was made for the YoYo Games 🎆Amaze Me Game Jam🎆! The theme was "NEON".

 

DESCRIPTION

In this game you must help an atom escape the photon storm that spawned it by bouncing from particle to particle along the length of the particle accelerator! Points are awarded for the distance you travel, the number of bounces you make, and the quarks you pick up along the way...

 

FEATURES:
  • Online and Local high score Leaderboards!
  • Achievements that unlock extra atoms with which to play!
  • Ultra-fast game loop!
  • Music by Kubbi!

 

CONTROLS

The game is controlled entirely by the mouse.
